name: MTG Manager
description:
The essential Magic: the Gathering™ app is here. Instantly scan cards, check current prices and translate up to eleven languages, add them to your collection, manage your favorite decks, use the built-in trade feature, and more!

Free Features:
* Instantly scan cards in any language (single cards or bulk scan)
* Translate cards into English in real-time using Augmented Reality
* Check up-to-date prices and charts from TCGPlayer.com, MagicCardMarket.eu or MTGMintCard.com
* Create, manage and export multiple Inventory bins
* Track your cards current market value, amount invested and value gained
* Select cards grade, purchase date and language
* Create, manage and buy your favorite decks. Check detailed charts and statistics
* Use the built-in trading feature to compare trade value
* Use in offline mode

In-App Purchases:
* Expand inventory slots
* Save the latest expansions to your inventories and decks
- Any purchase you make also unlocks price history charts
